summary: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.
cast: Vladimir Garin|Ivan Dobronravov|Konstantin Lavronenko|Nataliya Vdovina|Galina Popova|Aleksey Suknovalov|Lazar Dubovik|Elizaveta Aleksandrova|Lyubov Kazakova|Andrey Sumin|Aleksey Proshchikin|Viktor Alenin|Stas Orlov|Arseniy Belousov|Sofya Bagdasarova|Arseniy Bagdasarov|Alla Tomasheva|Evgeniy Belyanskiy
title: El regreso
